alert.note: Alert for Coastal Flagler; Inland Flagler; Inland St. Johns (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 4:17PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Flagler and southeastern St. Johns Counties through 500 PM EDT... At 417 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Marineland to 11 miles northwest of Daytona Beach. Movement was northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Palm Coast, Flagler Beach, Bunnell, Marineland, Crescent Beach, Beverly Beach and Espanola. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Flagler; Inland Flagler; Inland St. Johns
